title: Forget me not
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Death
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mentally handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Grief
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Italians - Australia
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Fathers and daughters
description: Set in Australia in the 1960's, "Forget me not" is a short drama about Anna (Alice Garner), a young Italo-Australian woman who is forced to abandon caring for her younger, intellectually disabled sister through the devious machinations of her widowed father. Examining grief, loss, and the deeply embedded patriarchal mores of mid-century Australia - in both the Italian and Anglo communities - this short film is an evocative period piece.
